title: Terminator The Sarah Connor Chronicles S02 BD Rip 1080p
description:
This is the entire second season of Terminator The Sarah Connor Chronicles (TSCC) from 2009, taken directly from the Blu Ray.

This is an h265 (HEVC) 10 bit LE 2 pass high quality 1080p rip of all 22 episodes.

I used x265 to create a VBR in 2 passes, at an average of 1400kbps and peak of 3000kbps. Each episode required around 8-10 hours to encode.

The audio is 5.1 AC3 at 384kbps. 

Finally, the English, FranÃ§ais and EspaÃ±ol subtitles are included (soft coded). The SRT files are also included.

I think x265 has done a good job, creating a very good reproduction of the original blu ray files, at a fraction of the original sizes.

Please share and enjoy.
